description.@en: Whether it was lopped off at the hands of a vicious mercenary or somehow torn asunder in the complex cogs of a war machine, you lost use of your hand long ago. In its place is an iron prosthesis, clumsy to attach and difficult to use. A webbing of leather straps adorns your arm, from wrist to elbow.

effect.@en: You cannot hold weapons which are two-handed and must flip the results to fail any Skill Test requiring use of both hands.
